metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12228 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Asterisk Open Source 15.x before 15.4.1. When connected to Asterisk via TCP/TLS, if the client abruptly disconnects, or sends a specially crafted message, then Asterisk gets caught in an infinite loop while trying to read the data stream. This renders the system unusable.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
